summary: Implemented a new PersonalMomentEffect overlay (radial burst + sparkles + heart burst) and integrated it into ValentinePage, triggering it on a proposal click handler. CSS support for the new overlay/effect was added to index.css. One REQ-9 acceptance criterion (both proposal buttons triggering the effect) cannot be fully verified from the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Clicking either proposal button (‚ÄúYes ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äù or ‚ÄúOf course Yes üíï‚Äù) triggers the new effect in addition to the existing final-section reveal + smooth scroll behavior.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the new effect is triggered in `handleYesClick`, but the truncated ValentinePage diff does not show the proposal buttons wiring (i.e., that both buttons call this handler).
